item.description: A new format on a new night! For members who want to learn more about Latino literature and culture, we offer a second monthly meetup. Karen will facilitate the first of these meetings, and will share one of her favorite short writings, the Desiderata. Margaret will follow with a poem by Gabriela Mistral. We'll read them aloud, then the group can discuss the two works. Got a favorite poem or song? Bring it along! (Note: this meetup does not replace our usual monthly fiesta on the third Tuesday of the month. You can choose one, or come to both!)

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: An Evening Tertulia: poetry, readings, and songs
